resources.string: Never lose access to your accounts and services.
Your secrets will be locked into a box. Each box can be distributed without hesitation since only the box-key can open it.
You own a box-key which matches to all boxes. It will be split like a puzzle and your friends will get one part each.
When you want to restore a secret the box-key is needed. The majority of the parts of the puzzle is sufficient to open a box.

You have not backed up any secrets yet. Please tap the button in the right lower corner to do so.

There are lots of secrets you could backup, for example:
 • Keys of your Email or Bitcoin account
 • SSH Keys
 • Key of an encrypted file directory
Your friends can send you a key part. Just tap the button in the right lower corner to scan one.
Scanned QR Code is not a key part or it is a key part of another person or a backup
Scanned QR Code is no foreign key part.
This QR-Code is not a box or it cannot be opened with the restored key.
Enter a name to find this backup again later.
Scan the QR-Code of your printed backup.
Scan the QR-Code you sent via E-Mail.
How many key parts should be needed to restore a backup?
At least %1$d key parts must be chosen.
How many persons would you like to send a part of your key?
Key parts needed to restore a backup cannot be greater than the count of persons that should receive a key part.
You need to collect the key parts of your key to reveal your backup.
You will send key parts to your friends later. When you want them back the name will help your friends to identify the key parts that belong to you.
Attention: Before you can create a backup you need to split your key.
Unfortunately the restored backup is too large.

Share pieces of the key needed to recover your backups later. This guarantees that you can restore your secrets event when you lost this phone and that nobody can reveal your secrets by stealing your phone.
You have already split your key into multiple pieces. They need to be sent to friends. There are %1$d parts left to send.
Start storing secrets like passwords or keys from an encrypted hard drive. Scroll left to see an overview of your backups and add a new one.
There are enough key parts stored on this device to restore your key. If you loose your phone, your boxes can also be opened by a thief. Distribute more key parts!
Give %1$s a copy of your backup
Send a key part to %1$s via QR Code.
You printed a QR Code with a key part for %1$s. Did this person receive the paper?
You sent %1$s an E-Mail with a key part. Did this person receive it?
Recently you created the backup \"%1$s\". Do you want to print or send it again?
You have chosen contacts for every part of your key. You can still select another contact for a key part if the currently chosen person has not received it yet.

plurals.name: contact_chooser_share_parts_description
plurals.item: Who should receive a part of your key? Never send multiple parts to the same person! There is %1$d part left to send.
Who should receive a part of your key? Never send multiple parts to the same person! There are %1$d parts left to send.

plurals.name: contact_chooser_receive_parts_description
plurals.item: You need to collect %1$d more key part. Scan a QR Code from a device of that person, from an E-Mail you sent or from a paper.
You need to collect %1$d more key parts. Scan a QR Code from a device of that person, from an E-Mail you sent or from a paper.

resources.string: How should the key part be sent?
QR Code of a key part
This QR Code contains your restored backup.
Unfortunately the QR Code cannot be displayed.
Secret is stored successfully encrypted in cloud.
You scanned successfully a secret as QR code.
A new backup of your secret will be created. This backup is encrypted and will be stored in the cloud. Enter a name for this secret:
A new backup of your secret will be created. This backup is encrypted and will be stored in the cloud. Enter a name for this secret:
